annotations.description: Let's look at the drinks that were popular way back in 1918! This seemed relevant only last week when I shot it! Bail Fund: https://bit.ly/3dwyRiU NAACP LDF:...
annotations.title: Drinks from the Spanish Flu | How to Drink

textContent:
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Heavy Cream
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Creme de Menthe
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Creme de Cacao

Shake over ice, strain
garnish with grated nutmeg

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kV7Wv8yva_s
title: Grasshopper (1918)
